title: A comprehensive study on energy management, sensitivity analysis, and inertia compliance of feed-in tariff in IEEE bus systems with grid-connected renewable energy sources
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Sadasiva Behera, Sumana Das, B.S.S. Ganesh Pardhu, Ram Ishwar Vais, Naladi Ram Babu, Sanjeev Kumar Bhagat, Mohammed Alharbi, Wulfran Fendzi Mbasso
